We can examine the relation between these markers and phenotypic axes

```{r plot,echo=TRUE}

  axis.title.x = element_text(size = 40),
  axis.text.x = element_text(size = 40),
  axis.text.y = element_text(size = 40),
  axis.title.y = element_text(size = 40))

p<-ggplot(df_axis_bio_marker_s_red, aes(x=value, y=log( as.numeric(as.character(TESTVALUE))),10) )+ geom_smooth(method='lm',formula=y~x)+ylab("log10 concentration CSF AÎ²1-42")+xlab("Score Phenotypic Axis 1")+geom_point(aes(colour=factor(TESTNAME)),size=8)+ theme(legend.position = "none")
```
